short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for learning vocabulary and improving language skills.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LearnNewWord - Elevate Your Vocabulary with this Chrome Extension
Unlock the power of words and enhance your language skills with LearnNewWord, the ultimate Chrome extension for vocabulary mastery!

Features:
1. Dictionary Lookup: Effortlessly explore word meanings with the integrated dictionary lookup feature. Instantly access comprehensive definitions, pronunciation guides, and usage examples, empowering you to understand and use new words with confidence.
2. Personalized Vocabulary: Tailor your learning journey with customizable word lists. Focus on specific themes, difficulty levels, or even import your own word sets to create a personalized curriculum that suits your unique language goals.
3. Review Word Mastery: Reinforce your learning through the dedicated Review Word feature. Track and revisit previously learned words, ensuring retention and mastery over time. This interactive tool solidifies your understanding and ensures that your expanding vocabulary becomes a lasting part of your linguistic repertoire.

Supporting dictionary:
 - English to English 
 - English to Vietnamnese
 - Vietnamnese to English, Chinese 
 - Chinese to English, Vietnamnese
 - Google Image
 - Wikipedia
